channel.title: Beta Testers
channel.description:
Ok well I am looking for 1-3 beta testers to help me see if the client is connecting.
Three things you will need: 1) Hamachi 2) Client (471 kb) 3) Game File. (6.38 mb)
Comment to let me know you wish to be a beta tester.
Once you comment me I will send you the client and game file links and also my Hamachi network and network password. Then you will extract the client. [b]DO NOT EXTRACT THE GAME FILE[/b]!!! Next go into the client folder and run the client. You will then go to [b]OPTIONS[/b] and scroll to the [b]THIRD[/b] submenu under the options tab. Locate [b]SYNCHRONIZE[/b]. Make sure that it is [b]UNCHECKED[/b]. Then go back to the options tab and scroll to the very last submenu. Make sure that [b]WIRELESS ADAPTER[/b] is checked. Now that you have the wireless adapter set up press [b]ctrl+M[/b]. A menu should pop-up. In the [b]GENERAL[/b] of the new menu make sure the [b]NETWORK[/b] bullet is selected. Then go to the [b]CLIENT[/b] tab of the new menu and type in my hamachi address. Once all the players have connected go to [b]FILE[/b], [b]OPEN[/b], and locate the game files you downloaded. Once the game loads up be sure to click on multiplayer.
Thanks everybody!
ps. I'm sorry I'm not being very descriptive on this post its just that I don't wan't too much info getting out about my server just yet. I will give you more info in a pm if you become a beta tester.

item.title: Beta Testers
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:3, topic:341926”]Hamachi? You should never need to use Hamachi unless you cannot get access your router’s password.[/quote]That & if he using Mobile/USB internet. Also Dial up maybe? not sure, but Mobile/USB you can’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Testers

item.description:
@HellRain-T wrote:

Ok well I am looking for 1-3 beta testers to help me see if the client is connecting.

Then go back to the options tab and scroll to the very last submenu. Make sure that WIRELESS ADAPTER is checked. Now that you have the wireless adapter set up press ctrl+M. A menu should pop-up. Once all the players have connected go to FILE, OPEN, and locate the game files you downloaded. Once the game loads up be sure to click on multiplayer.

Thanks everybody!
